pkgmetadata.longdescription: PyCrash is a Run-Time Exception Dumper which handles uncaught exceptions during the execution of Python programs and collects information about the program context. PyCrash can be very useful in report bug information, because the programmer can easily analyse the program execution context of the crashed application. The format of the crash dump file generated by PyCrash is XML, so the programmer can easily read this file to understand why the program is crashed.
